page.title: 10A Wildlife Breeding Centre
page.content: {Graham Dangerfield's Centre}at{Bower {Heath, Harpenden}extends over{4.5 {acres,}on which he breeds{endangered {species.}There are{20}such species at the centre, totalling{200 animals. Some are{released}into their{natural {habitats,}while others are{sold}to {collections}all over the{world,}to prevent{collectors}taking {animals and {birds}from the{wild. Caroline Brown, an assistant, has{hand reared}over {1000 young creatures. Injured animals are{taken in}and looked after until they are{better.}Graham has worked in this field for{30 years.}Presently his project is the{conservation}of{Maned {Wolves. Without help such as his}they could be extinct by the year{2000.}His house, almost{hidden}with{creepers, {stands amidst woodland:}a{magical {house}to{animal}lovers. We all feel he deserves a lot more{support.
